pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit GLM's with High-Dimensional k-Way Fixed Effects // Provides a routine to concentrate out factors with many levels during the optimization of the log-likelihood function of the corresponding generalized linear model (glm). The package is based on the algorithm proposed by Stammann (2018) arXiv:1707.01815 and is restricted to glm's that are based on maximum likelihood estimation and non-linear. It also offers an efficient algorithm to recover estimates of the fixed effects in a post-estimation routine. The package also includes robust and multi-way clustered standard errors.
